snippet: Youssou N’Dour, although extremely popular in his country, must overcome a lack of political experience in his campaign.
abstract: Senegalese singer-songwriter Youssou N'Dour announces that he will add his name to already crowded field of contenders in country's presidential elections; N'Dour enjoys extreme popularity in Senegal, but must overcome a lack of political experience.
lead_paragraph: Youssou N’Dour, although extremely popular in his country, must overcome a lack of political experience in his campaign.

headline.seo: Youssou N’Dour, Senegal Singer, Runs for President
headline.main: Singer Responds to ‘Patriotic Duty’ to Enter Senegal’s Presidential Race
headline.print_headline: Singer Responds to ‘Supreme Patriotic Duty’ to Enter Senegal’s Presidential Race
